thread.title: This guy’s dad ‘ruined’ his dog with a punk rock haircut and Twitter is losing it
thread.title_full: This guy’s dad ‘ruined’ his dog with a punk rock haircut and Twitter is losing it

author: Alex
title: This guy’s dad ‘ruined’ his dog with a punk rock haircut and Twitter is losing it
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
This dad was simply trying to give his dog a sweet new look, but now Twitter is roasting the pooch’s fresh punk rock ‘do. 
His son shared a picture of their dog’s “ruined” haircut and the post has since been retweeted over 13,000 times. 2 
Here’s a closer look: 3 
Little guy’s got the punker attitude and everything — look at that mean mug! 
Twitter couldn’t stop dogging on the rebellious fashion statement: 4 5 
But at least one guy thinks it looks cool (I knew I wasn’t alone on this one): Advertisement
